MriCloudR 0.9.3
  • Reference

DTI Data Payload Class

DtiSegData-class.Rd

This class is used to create an object payload for DTI mapping processing.

Fields

processingServer

processing server to use on backend

dataZip

zip payload filename. The zip file must contain the following files with indicated naming convention : 1) b0 image (subjectname_b0.img, subjectname_b0.hdr) 2) Mean diffusion weighted images (subjectname_dwi.img, subjectname_dwi.hdr) 3) Tensor file (subjectname_tensor.dat), which is a raw matrix with 6xD1xD2xD3)

sliceType

"Axial"

atlas

"Pediatric_168labels_12atlases_V1", "Adult_168labels_8atlases_V1". Defaults to "Adult_168labels_8atlases_V1".

description

Any description of the dataset (OPTIONAL)

Contents
